data.title: Who is Christine Quinn's husband? Is she still married to Christian Richard?
data.meta_description: Do you want to know more about Christine Quinn's husband, Christian Richard? Check out this article to learn about Christian's marriage, career and net worth.
data.text:
Christine Quinn's husband, Christian Richard, is her life and business partner. A mutual friend introduced the lovely pair, and they immediately fell for each other. They went on to wed in December 2019 and welcomed a child in May 2021.

The successful real estate broker Christine Quinn is famous for her starring role in Netflix’s hit TV show Selling Sunset. Away from the screen, Christine Quinn lives a life of domestic bliss with her husband, Christian Richard and their child, Christian Georges Dumontet.

Who is Christine Quinn?

Born on October 14, 1998, in Dallas, Texas, USA, Christine Quinn is renowned as the standout personality in the widely acclaimed Netflix TV series Selling Sunset, which has earned two Emmy nominations.

Christine is also an accomplished real estate professional and is the founder and Chief Marketing Officer (CMO) of her latest venture, RealOpen. The company facilitates real estate transactions through cryptocurrency. Beyond her real estate endeavours, Christine is a Samsung ambassador and has spearheaded marketing campaigns for various fashion brands.

Who is Christian Richard?

Christian Richard (nee Dumontet) lived most of his on the East Coast. He grew up in Middletown, New Jersey and went to the College of New Jersey for a BA in computer science, which he completed in 2000.

What does Christian Richard do for a living?

According to Christian's LinkedIn profile, his first job was as a software engineer at Cisco, Boston. In 2004, he cofounded Foodler, an online food ordering service. As the CEO, Christian made Foodler one of North America's largest food ordering services. It had more than 15,000 restaurants in Canada and 48 US states.

In 2016, Christian Richard, who wrote most of Foodler software, was voted Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year Finalist. In 2017, GrubHub acquired Foodler for an undisclosed amount, allowing Christian to retire at 35.

He currently works at RealOpen, which he launched with his wife in April 2022. The company allows people to buy or sell real estate with cryptocurrency.

Christian Richard and Christine Quinn wedding

How did Christian Richard and Christine Quinn meet? After Selling Sunset's first season, a mutual friend set up Christian and Christine – they had an immediate connection. The couple got engaged on 2019 Valentine's Day and married in a secret wedding ceremony on December 15, 2019.

They didn't share their marriage news until several months later when it was featured on the third season of the Netflix reality show Selling Sunsets. Their gothic, winter-themed wedding had only 75 guests, including some of Christine's Netflix show Selling Sunset co-stars. Quinn rocked a custom-made black gown, contrary to the wedding tradition.

Is Christian Richard still married to Christine Quinn?

Christian Richard and Christine Quinn are still married, and their love grows strong each day. In May 2021, they welcomed their first child, son Christian George Dumontet, named after Richard's father.

They live in Christian Richard's 5,917 square feet Hollywood Hill Mansion. Funny enough, Christine Quinn sold the five-bedroom, seven-bathroom property to Christian Richard before moving in with him in 2019.

Christian Richard's net worth

Is Christine's husband a billionaire? According to MoneyInc, Christian Richard's net worth is approximately $20 million. Christian is a successful software developer and has worked at Cisco Systems. He was the CEO of Foodler, an online food delivery service, before selling it to GrubHub and retiring at 35.

Final word on Christian Richard

Christine Quinn's husband, Christian Richard, is a successful entrepreneur. A friend introduced him to Christine, and they immediately hit it off. They are still married, have one child, son Christian George Dumontet and are cofounders of a real estate company, RealOpen.

Tuko.co.ke has shared an article about Orson Salazar, Paz Vega's husband, career and lifestyle. A-list celebrities constantly rub shoulders with powerful and wealthy people at glamorous events.

So, it's no surprise Paz Vega fell in love with Orson Salazar, one of Venezuela's most successful men. They have been married for over two decades, but people are still interested in their life.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
